q_ch: Skilled Sewers 在2024年6月前完成了多少个缝纫任务，这些缝纫任务都做了什么类型的产品？
q_en: How many sewing tasks did Skilled Sewers complete before June 2024, and what types of products were produced for these sewing tasks?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Skilled Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the ID of the working group with the name 'Skilled Sewers'

steps.sql: ['SELECT id, order_product_id FROM sewing_tasks WHERE working_group_id = 7 AND end_time < '2024-06-01';']
steps.description: Find the completed sewing tasks for the working group 'Skilled Sewers' before June 2024
steps.results: (1064, "You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near '['SELECT id, order_product_id FROM sewing_tasks WHERE working_group_id = 7 AND e' at line 1")
